question: Which company has tied up with the Russian aircraft corporation MiG to provide post-warranty support to the Indian Navy jets?
explanation:
Aviatech Enterprises, one of the companies of the Delhi-based Crown group, working in the field of defence aerospace maintenance, has tied up with the Russian aircraft corporation MiG.
This partnership has been made to provide post-warranty support to the Indian Navyâ€™s MiG-29K and MiG-29KUB fighter jets.
